full_threads.body: @rica I have done this one… Please add 30mins cheers

Hi Heath,

Thanks – is there any way we can remove the download button – we don’t want people to be able to download it.

Also, could we mimic the grey-textured background on the full screen view to replace the black background on the normal view?

Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan
Social and Digital Marketing Manager
Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>

To: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Digital Look Book Needed

Hi Madeleine,

Ok sure, we have used an existing solution called 3D flip book to achieve this look as you already have the PDF.

Here is the link: https://advantagestyling.com.au/digital-look-book/ <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadvantagestyling.com.au%2Fdigital-look-book%2F&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7C7d62b4be7dfd449f586608d8e1e6355e%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637507726159074123%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=T6bsZEy5iK68gzvVI5UQjoUyyBpFg8bnU6w3CVwbcSM%3D&reserved=0> I think it will do the trick : )

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

On 8 Mar 2021, at 1:52 pm, Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Okay great – as long as you can get that flipbook look that’s the feature, we’re after.

Just so you know that Dan really liked certain features which I’m hoping you can re-create:

Black background to make the images really pop
The feeling of actually turning the pages

I think it would be better as a hidden page – so people with only the link can view it.

You can download the seniors portfolio here: https://indd.adobe.com/view/f330cdd7-d686-4739-8915-dd8efcc9a14e <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Findd.adobe.com%2Fview%2Ff330cdd7-d686-4739-8915-dd8efcc9a14e&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7C7d62b4be7dfd449f586608d8e1e6355e%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637507726159084118%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=PS4xh%2BGAEZJWdZa2jWAotEtTFF9ax7I1aqC1z2M26jI%3D&reserved=0> Let me know if you need another file type.

Let me know next steps.


Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan
Social and Digital Marketing Manager
Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Date: Thursday, 4 March 2021 at 7:39 pm
To: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Digital Look Book Needed

Hi Madeleine,

Yes this is very doable. We can create it as a PDF and embed a ‘flip book’ on a hidden page of the website. Alternatively it can be an actual web page, probably with some sub navigation as it’s pretty long.

Did you have a preference of either of the above?

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

On 4 Mar 2021, at 11:19 am, Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

How are you?

We want to create a digital version of our Seniors Look Book. Currently it’s just a hard cover book but we want to host it on our website as a ghost page so that we can give agents/vendors a link to have a digital version of it if they like.

This is an example of one- https://www.flipsnack.com/cordonydesignsbrochure/cordony-designs-pre-sale-brochure-vol-iii.html <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.flipsnack.com%2Fcordonydesignsbrochure%2Fcordony-designs-pre-sale-brochure-vol-iii.html&data=04%7C01%7Cmadeleine%40advantagestyling.com.au%7C7d62b4be7dfd449f586608d8e1e6355e%7C990eae31a9404d14b2ac18d698fa2459%7C1%7C0%7C637507726159114104%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=8m7jXf11OUanUonNEeKNzo48ATwW6YP1YFaUVBNpdbo%3D&reserved=0>

Do you think you would be able to do this?

Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan
Social and Digital Marketing Manager
Advantage Property Styling and Interior Design
